title: How to Use plugins in SDF or convert SDF to URDF?

content.raw:
I have already written my SDF model, and are going to control it in my simulation. But I find that, it seems that plugins can only be use in URDF files, at lease those simulations I have known about are all using URDF. So I wonder if the usage of plugins are still limited to URDF? If so, is there any way to transform SDF to URDF? 

Any one who has ideas of this, please give me some help.  I would be very grateful.

Waiting for replies.
